changeSet.author: alisitsin
changeSet.sql: create table fishes ( fish_id bigint not null, average_weight float4, end_date_of_prohibition varchar(255), name varchar(255), start_date_of_prohibition varchar(255), primary key (fish_id) ); alter table if exists preferences add constraint FK63uf1aps6jaungiveg2jaddmx foreign key (fish_id) references fishes; alter table if exists findings add constraint FKfq68e7v89jqp37gorxige62ou foreign key (fish_id) references fishes; alter table if exists bitings add constraint FKd35qn48y0552dcb2wia5kpbcq foreign key (fish_id) references fishes; create sequence fish_id_seq start with 1000 increment by 1;
